content: Provide a list of 20 words that have 'ious' somewhere in them.

Sure! Here are 20 words that contain "ious" somewhere in them:

1. Curious
2. Delicious
3. Obvious
4. Mysterious
5. Ambitious
6. Gracious
7. Precious
8. Various
9. Spacious
10. Serious
11. Ambiguous
12. Furious
13. Glorious
14. Jealous
15. Continuous
16. Previous
17. Precious
18. Suspicious
19. Official
20. Artificial

I hope this helps! Let me know if you need more assistance.
